price: Yε’kaa sε; “Mo nyinaa monsiane mfri (Turo no) mu nkͻ. Nokorε sε, ͻkwan kyerε befri Me nkyεn aba mo hͻ, na obiara a, obedi Me kwan kyerε no akyi no, ͻmmͻ hu na ne werε nso nnho.
arabic: قُلۡنَا ٱهۡبِطُواْ مِنۡهَا جَمِيعٗاۖ فَإِمَّا يَأۡتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّي هُدٗى فَمَن تَبِعَ هُدَايَ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul'nā ih'biṭū min'hā jamīʿan fa-immā yatiyannakum minnī hudan faman tabiʿa hudāya falā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
